Chris Bamborough is a designer and researcher working in the field of architecture.

This site is a collection of tool explorations and projects. If you want to venture out you can read about his professional experience, scroll through his 42 character musings, learn about his projects in more detail, check out his coding interests, watch some films heâ€™s made, listen to his musical influences, browse his visual inspirations, connect with some of his research, or learn about some of his current ideas.
